expo.name: Smart Subscription Tracker

infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app does not track you. This permission is required by Apple but we respect your privacy.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is not used by this app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo library access is not used by this app.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Calendar access is not used by this app.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Reminders access is not used by this app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location access is not used by this app.

expo.description: Track and manage all your subscriptions in one place. Never miss a renewal date and stay on top of your monthly expenses.
